text: The Real Housewives of Orange County reunion part one caused some serious damage — weeks after it was shot! As RadarOnline. com readers know, Vicki Gunvalson and Kelly Dodd ‘ s friendship crumbled at the beginning of season 13, when Vicki, 56, set up Kelly ’ s ex - husband Michael on a date with one of their mutual girlfriends — behind Kelly ’ s back. Part one started off with Andy Cohen breaking the ice by telling Vicki that he was admiring her new face. Meanwhile, Shannon Beador dropped the first bombshell by telling Andy, 50, that she ’ d lost 32 pounds since last season.
